text: Wetzel's Pretzels is an American chain of fast-food restaurants, specializing in pretzels and hot dogs. It has more than 370 locations across the United States, Canada and Central America, mostly located in shopping malls, airports, theme parks, and stadia; plus, as of recently, food trucks. It is headquartered in Pasadena, California. It was founded in 1994. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1994 establishments in the United States
title: Wetzel's Pretzels
